document_data.name: Phintarn's brother
document_data.mainbody:
The '''brother''' of Lord [[Phintarn|Phintarn "Redblade"]] of [[Llorkh]] in the [[Savage Frontier]] owned the [[Worried Wyvern (Llorkh)|Worried Wyvern]], the only [[inn]] in the town in the 1350s [[DR]].

Not long after Phintarn was murdered in a [[Zhentarim]] takeover shortly before the [[1357 DR|Year of the Prince, 1357 DR]],<ref group="note">The date of this unknown. ''[[Waterdeep and the North]]'' (dated [[1357 DR]]) only says this was "recently", implying sometime in 1357 DR or shortly before. his brother died mysteriously one night, and his inn was razed the very next day.
